name: Shift and Catch 'em
description:
Stuck in between space and the stratosphere?
Check.

You lost all of your food and need to save it while dodging raining meteors?
Check.

Shapeshifting between collecting and shooting?
Check.

In this game you need nerves of steel while you dodge, shoot and crash to meteors while you're trying to save your precious food from dissappearing to the void. Choose wisely what you shoot at.

Shift and Catch 'em was developed part of Ludum Dare 35, 72 hour game jam. It's done by 2 people and the music was provided by our trusted artist.

Code: @fatsopanda
Art @ivdza_
Music: @bpblog

Please take a few minutes to rate our entry on Ludum Dare 35: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-35/?action=preview&uid=90520
